00016 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00017   * File:    cszip.h
00018   * Purpose: Header file for szip encoding information.
00019   * Dependencies: should only be included from hcompi.h
00020   * Invokes: none
00021   * Contents: Structures & definitions for szip encoding.  This header
00022   *              should only be included in hcomp.c and cszip.c.
00023   * Structure definitions:
00024   * Constant definitions:
00025   *---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/

00036 /* Special parameters for szip compression */
00037 /* [These are aliases for the similar definitions in ricehdf.h header file] */
00038 #define H4_SZ_ALLOW_K13_OPTION_MASK     1
00039 #define H4_SZ_CHIP_OPTION_MASK          2
00040 #define H4_SZ_EC_OPTION_MASK            4
00041 #define H4_SZ_LSB_OPTION_MASK           8
00042 #define H4_SZ_MSB_OPTION_MASK           16
00043 #define H4_SZ_NN_OPTION_MASK            32
00044 #define H4_SZ_RAW_OPTION_MASK           128

00082 /* SZIP [en|de]coding information */
00083 typedef struct
00084 {
00085      int32       offset;    /* offset in the file */
00086      uint8       *buffer;   /* buffer for storing SZIP bytes */
00087      int32       buffer_pos;
00088      int32       buffer_size;
00089      int32 bits_per_pixel;
00090      int32 options_mask;
00091      int32 pixels;
00092      int32 pixels_per_block;
00093      int32 pixels_per_scanline;
00094      enum
00095        {
00096            SZIP_INIT, SZIP_RUN,  SZIP_TERM
00097        }
00098      szip_state;                  /* state of the buffer storage */
00099      enum { SZIP_CLEAN, SZIP_DIRTY } szip_dirty;
00100 }
00101 comp_coder_szip_info_t;
00102 
00103 #define SZ_H4_REV_2 0x10000   /* special bit to signal revised format */
00104 
00105 #ifndef CSZIP_MASTER
00106 extern funclist_t cszip_funcs;   /* functions to perform szip encoding */
00107 #else
00108 funclist_t  cszip_funcs =
00109 {                               /* functions to perform szip encoding */
00110      HCPcszip_stread,
00111      HCPcszip_stwrite,
00112      HCPcszip_seek,
00113      HCPcszip_inquire,
00114      HCPcszip_read,
00115      HCPcszip_write,
00116      HCPcszip_endaccess
00117 };
00118 #endif
00119 
00120 #endif /* __CSZIP_H */
